value.title: HPE Discover 2023: GreenLake enters the AI market with LLM cloud service
value.excerpt: GreenLake for LLMs was created in partnership with Aleph Alpha, a German AI startup, which provided a pre-trained LLM called Luminous. The Luminous LLM can work in English, French, German, Italian and Spanish and can use text and images to make predictions.

value.title: DeepMind's co-founder suggested testing an AI chatbot's ability to turn $100,000 into $1 million to measure human-like intelligence
value.excerpt: Mustafa Suleyman said the original Turing Test is outdated because it's "unclear" whether it's a "meaningful milestone" for AI intelligence anymore.

value.title: 'AI Jesus' talks dating, relationships, morals — even offers video-gaming tips
value.excerpt: An AI "version" of Jesus nicknamed "AI Jesus" takes questions via livestream and gives answers on topics from dating to faith to video gaming. Faith leaders weighed in on where truth can be found.

value.title: How generative AI is creating new classes of security threats
value.excerpt: Why we must act now so that security professionals can develop strategies and react as large-scale issues arise with the evolution of AI.

value.title: Facebook Parent Company Meta Uses Bible Translations To Train Artificial Intelligence In Speech Recognition
value.excerpt: The artificial intelligence arm of Facebook parent company Meta has turned to widely translated religious texts like the Bible to provide data for its Massively Multilingual Speech project, which aims to expand text-to-speech and speech-to-text technology to underserved languages.

value.title: AI-powered malware is a growing security concern, CyberArk survey finds

value.title: Meta launches MusicGen, an AI-powered music generator

value.title: To avoid AI doom, learn from nuclear safety
value.excerpt: The single biggest thing the AI community could learn from nuclear risk is the importance of traceability: putting every single action and component under the microscope to be analyzed and recorded in meticulous detail.

value.title: EU asks Big Tech to label AI-generated content
